DOC.brief_summary: This is a non-interventional study of voriconazole tablet in Korea which is mandated by the Korean government agency.
DOC.brief_title: Non-Interventional Post Marketing Surveillance Study To Observe The Safety And Efficacy Of VfendÂ® Tablet In Korea
DOC.criteria: Patients who are indicated for voriconazole table according to the drug package insert.
